meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_testimonial

languageKey.label: The testimonial title. Mainly used in the BE in table listings, as testimonials don't really need a title.
The testimonial's main body text.
The name of the person who has made the testimonial.
The date that the testimonial was made.
The company that the person making the testimonial works for.
The position in the company that the person making the testimonial holds.
An image of the person making the testimonial, or the company logo.
The date that this testimonial should start showing up in the FE.
The date that this testimonial should stop showing up in the FE.
